titleInfo.title: 'File 6/2 IV Recruits for the Bahrain State Police and supply of Clothing to them'

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged chronologically from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 67; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 4-61; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between the Political Agent in Bahrain, Adviser to the Government of Bahrain (Charles Dalrymple Belgrave), Inspector General of Police in Poona, Superintendent of Police in Karachi and Tatta Districts, Government of Bombay (Home Department), Political Residency in the Persian Gulf at Bushire, and Air Headquarters in Iraq and Persia.The papers concern the recruitment and training of men for the Bahrain State Police, mostly arrangements for superintendent training for selected men at an officer training school in Nasik [Nashik] and for traffic control training in Karachi.Folios 62-66 are internal office notes.
